S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-6314: Upgrade from 10.10 fails with ClassCastException
Make ExecRowBuilder implement the Formatable interface so that any Formatable instances referenced from its fields are stored using Formatable logic instead of Serializable logic.
Add type checking in FormatIdInputStream's error handlers to prevent the underlying exception from being shadowed by a ClassCastException under certain circumstances.
